overview:
William Tunstall-Pedoe is an AI technology entrepreneur.

He is currently CEO of True Knowledge which he founded based on research he began in 1998 and he has more than twenty-five years experience of both developing and commercially exploiting software products that push the boundaries of what is possible in Artificial Intelligence. In addition to inventing the technology on which True Knowledge is based, William is also credited with being the first and only person to develop software that can solve and explain cryptic crossword clues. He is also the developer of Anagram Genius - a software product that has been used by approximately five million people and which generated the anagrams that appear in the best-selling Da Vinci Code book and movie.
